Package ca.cgjennings.ui

Class CapsuleBorder

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
ca.cgjennings.ui.CapsuleBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Border
public class CapsuleBorder extends AbstractBorder
Draws a border with a horizontal capsule shape, rounded on the ends and with an optional thin border along the top and/or bottom.
Since:
3.0
See Also:
Serialized Form
